job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-13T11:55:16.000Z", "description": "Work with the best in the industry on underwater vehicles!

This Jobot Job is hosted by Tori Bender

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the \"Apply\" button and sending us your resume.

A Bit About Us

Our client is changing the world through the development of ocean-based vehicles. They are transforming the way ocean data is collected and distributed worldwide, allowing scientists, engineers, and governments access to insights that were previously unobtainable.

You\u2019ll be a part of a team taking on earth\u2019s last frontier!



Why join us?

  • 100% of benefits are covered for employees.
  • Equity
Job Details

Your role
  • Build Machine Learning models for various data sets
  • Design and implement reports and quality visualizations of accuracy
  • Produce documentation and presentations
  • Work alongside other engineers to build an end-to-end data processing pipeline
Skills Required
  • Proficiency in various machine learning models (SVM, KNN, and CNN)
  • Detailed understanding of Python and associated learning libraries
  • Knowledge and use of databases
  • Experience with producing real-world ML results
What we\u2019d like to see
  • Show us evidence of your exceptional ability. Go ahead, brag!
  • Industry Experience in Machine learning
  • Independent project that demonstrates software proficiencies
Nice to have
  • Master's Degree, or equivalent experience, in a STEM field
ITAR Requirements

To conform to U.S. Government space technology export regulations, the applicant must be a U.S. citizen, lawful permanent resident of the U.S., protected individual as defined by ITAR (22 CFR
  • 120.15) or eligible to obtain the required authorizations from the U.S. Department of State.
Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the \"Apply\" button.
